name: Project 01: Tomahawk
description: Welcome to my first game/project that I've made with Unity! Dodge the axes and see how far you make it! Losing all your health (3 hearts) will end your run! Controls: Move up and down with "W" and "S" or the Up and Down arrow keys, and restart with "R" when dying.  Some issues: Not sure why, but there is a delay in the background music playing on your first run. After it gets going, it should be good though.  It works fine in Unity, but built version delays:/ Second issue is the Unity WebGL logo strip on bottom. If you know how to get rid of it, please let me know! Please share and leave feedback to help me improve as a learning game developer, thanks!
